last_episode_to_air.name: Have Yourself a Sardiney Little Christmas
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sam discovers that Santa Claus is vacationing in Swallow Falls and drags Flint along to pitch their Christmas ideas to the jolly old elf.

name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
original_name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
overview: The series is a prequel, featuring the high school years of Flint Lockwood, the eccentric young scientist in the films. In his adventures, he will be joined by Sam Sparks, a new girl in town and the school's "wannabe" reporter, along with Flint's dad Tim, Steve the Monkey, Manny as the head of the school's audiovisual club, Earl as a school gym teacher, Brent as a baby wear model, and Mayor Shelbourne, who wins every election on the pro-sardine platform.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Teenager Flint Lockwood has a knack for invention. With help from his pal Sam Sparks, he might even change the world -- if he doesn't break it first.

episodes.name: And the Winner Is...
episodes.overview: Flint and Sam reminisce about the first time they met when they went head-to-head at the school science fair and nearly destroyed the town.

episodes.name: Princess KittyMittens
episodes.overview: Flint begs Sam to let him see her most treasured possession, but when Sam relents Flint damages it and has to find a way to make it up to her.

episodes.name: Invent This!
episodes.overview: When Tim is celebrated for accidentally inventing a pencil holder, Flint gets jealous and starts to doubt his own skills as an inventor.

episodes.name: Bacon Girl
episodes.overview: Flint invents a way to make sardines taste like bacon so Sam can eat one without gagging, but Flint's invention has a few bacon-related side-effects.

episodes.name: Who You Calling Garbage?
episodes.overview: Flint creates an invention to take out the garbage, but it soon starts deciding for itself what, and who, counts as garbage.

episodes.name: The Ballad of Johnny Sardine
episodes.overview: Swallow Falls prepares to celebrate the birthday of its oldest sardine, a wish-granting fish named Johnny, but Flint and Sam put the entire event in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Millionaire Monkey
episodes.overview: When Steve wins the Swallow Falls lottery, townspeople line up claiming that they are Steve's best friend causing Flint to question Steve's true affections.

episodes.name: Baby Brent Sitter
episodes.overview: Flint and Sam babysit so they can buy a new board game, but when Brent hires them as his babysitter they have to decide whether the humiliation is worth the reward.

episodes.name: Spoiler Orb
episodes.overview: Flint modifies Sam's weather-predicting orb to predict the future, but knowing their future isn't as fun as they thought it would be.

episodes.name: The Pandas Are Coming
episodes.overview: Mayor Shelbourne brings a panda to Swallow Falls, but when the town falls under the panda's spell it's up to Flint and Sam to find out what's really going on.

episodes.name: Inventors Only
episodes.overview: Flint is excited to discover there's another inventor in town, but Sam suspects the inventor has an ulterior motive for befriending Flint.

episodes.name: Clock-a-Doodle-Doo
episodes.overview: To stop himself from being late for school, getting into more trouble, and missing all the fun, Flint decides to create a robo-rooster alarm from getting late for school.

episodes.name: The Sardemon
episodes.overview: Tim drags Flint out into the wilderness to participate in a Lockwood father-son tradition: catching the legendary Sardemon, the largest sardine in existence.

episodes.name: Earl or Pearl?
episodes.overview: Earl goes undercover as a female student named "Pearl" in order to befriend Sam and find out what Flint's planning to invent next.

episodes.name: Sardinefest
episodes.overview: Sam is determined to stop Swallow Falls' annual sardine race, which she firmly believes is animal cruelty.

episodes.name: Total Samesies
episodes.overview: When they are teased for being too similar, Flint and Sam try to prove that they are totally different.

episodes.name: Monkey Me, Monkey You
episodes.overview: When Flint accidentally combines himself with Steve, he must learn to live with the monkey inside him.

episodes.name: Best Invention Ever!
episodes.overview: After hearing Flint brag about sleep-inventing the best invention ever, the Mayor sees it as a money-making opportunity.

episodes.name: That's Sal, Folks!
episodes.overview: In trying to keep Sam from moving away, Flint accidentally animates the town's sardine statue, and it begins spilling the town's secrets.

episodes.name: Cloudy With a Chance of Clouds
episodes.overview: Flint gives Sam a Cloud-Maker for the anniversary of their friendship, but Sam's new cloud friend will not leave her side.

episodes.name: The Science of the Toot
episodes.overview: In a bid to make his classmates consider his idea for a science mural, Flint creates a toot-inducing bean.

episodes.name: Mr. Stressup
episodes.overview: After being inured by one of Flint's inventions, Tim's doctor wants him to relax, and Flint has just the thing to help.

episodes.name: Virtu-Earl Reality
episodes.overview: After encouraging Mr. Earl to have a day off, Sam and Flint learn he is too bored, and try to make things better for him.

episodes.name: Hair We Go Again
episodes.overview: Flint invents the hair unbalder when he realises he'll go bald one day, but Tim offers him another point of view by showing him the perks of being bald.

episodes.name: It's About Time
episodes.overview: Sam and Flint accidentally cryogenically freeze themselves in the town's time capsule, and emerge into a post-apocalyptic future.

episodes.name: Self-Helpie
episodes.overview: Flint invents a device that will put a good picture of him into the yearbook, but it also puts him in every picture that has ever existed.

episodes.name: Happy Clappy Monkey
episodes.overview: Steve falls in love with the cymbal-smashing electric monkey Flint brought in to replace Steve while he was on vacation.

episodes.name: Robot Rumble
episodes.overview: Flint enters his fearsome robot into a robot boxing competition, and when it comes face to face with Mayor Shelbourne's robot, the results are explosive.

episodes.name: My Pop Is Tops
episodes.overview: Flint and Gil argue over who has a better dad, setting off a secret competition pitting Tim and Mayor Shelbourne against each other, in a battle of parental prowess.

episodes.name: Clone Alone
episodes.overview: Flint accidentally makes a clone of himself, and is shocked to discover his clone is more popular than he is.

episodes.name: Coat of Harms
episodes.overview: Sam makes Flint a new tricked-out labcoat to replace his old smelly one, not realising it was a gift from his mom.

episodes.name: Earl of My Dreams
episodes.overview: When Flint gets Earl in trouble with his wife, Earl demands Flint help him get back into her good graces.

episodes.name: Spacy Race
episodes.overview: Flint builds a spaceship for an Australian businessman, Mr. Zorbleck, who may or may not actually be Australian.

episodes.name: Tim and Jim
episodes.overview: Tim's brother, Jim, comes to visit.

episodes.name: Mayornormal Activity
episodes.overview: Mayor Shelbourne buys up all the town's candy at Halloween and promises to give it all to the kid who makes it through his super scary haunted house.

episodes.name: Flintenstein
episodes.overview: While attempting to debunk Hollywood pseudoscience, Flint accidentally creates his own Frankenstein-like monster.

episodes.name: Ratbirds and Cheesyworms
episodes.overview: Flint shares his tale of how he invented Ratbirds.

episodes.name: Junk in the Trunk
episodes.overview: Flint is made a tempting offer when he sells his inventions at a yard sale.

episodes.name: The Inventor's Code
episodes.overview: Flint feels obligated to help out another inventor in town.

episodes.name: Baby-Baby Brent
episodes.overview: Brent is furious when Flint and Sam expose that he is no longer a baby.

episodes.name: The Talented Mr. Buttons
episodes.overview: Flint and Sam find a lost cat, and Sam sabotages efforts to find the owner so she can keep it.

episodes.name: The Girl Who Cried Meteor
episodes.overview: When Sam predicts that a meteoroid will crash into Swallow Falls, she and Flint have to find a way to move the island out of its way.

episodes.name: I Gotta Piñata
episodes.overview: Flint decides to have some fun when he is in charge of a birthday piñata.

episodes.name: Your Fish Is My Command
episodes.overview: Flint is fooled into creating a fish-cyborg army for Mayor Shelbourne.

episodes.name: So I Married a Watermelon
episodes.overview: Flint tries to get his father to eat healthier by inventing a spray to make Tim love fruits and vegetables.

episodes.name: The Shelbourne Identity
episodes.overview: Sam discovers and spills the beans that the Mayor's first name is Tootsie.

episodes.name: Appreciate This!
episodes.overview: Frustrated that the town doesn't appreciate the beauty around them, Sam makes Flint invent something to force them to do so.

episodes.name: She's a Shoe-In
episodes.overview: Flint asks Sam to train him for the annual father/son horseshoe contest, which uncovers Sam's troubled past with the sport.

episodes.name: Lobster Claus Is Coming to Town
episodes.overview: Flint introduces Sam to Swallow Falls' unique Christmas traditions, centered around the mythical Lobster Claus.

episodes.name: When I Was Your Age
episodes.overview: Flint invents a time machine to make his father like desserts.

episodes.name: Flint's Biggest Flup
episodes.overview: Flint and Sam move to the other side of the island to take up an inventing-free life.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Teenager Flint Lockwood has a knack for invention. With help from his pal Sam Sparks, he might even change the world -- if he doesn't break it first.

episodes.name: Einstein's Moustache
episodes.overview: Gil finds Flint's most prized possession, Einstein's moustache, and he starts wearing it.

episodes.name: Power Struggle
episodes.overview: When Flint's inventing makes the power bill skyrocket, Tim takes the Lockwood house off the grid.

episodes.name: Brentonium
episodes.overview: Flint helps Brent with his science project, inadvertently inventing a cool new element in the process.

episodes.name: Penguipocalypse
episodes.overview: Sam receives a pet penguin from her Pet of the Month Club.

episodes.name: Dance Fish Move Dance
episodes.overview: Mayor Shelbourne suffers a crisis of leadership when Flint beats his high score on the arcade's most difficult game.

episodes.name: Sonny With a Chance of Disappointment
episodes.overview: When Flint totals Tim's boat, he uses a ray to make his dad forget about the crash.

episodes.name: Sam's Imaginary Friend
episodes.overview: Flint invents a machine to bring Sam's imaginary friend into the real world.

episodes.name: Hands Up
episodes.overview: Flint realizes that all of the world's great inventors have large hands, so he invents a way to supersize his own mitts.

episodes.name: Brent Hog Day
episodes.overview: During Swallow Falls' annual Brent Hog Day festivities, Sam sets out to reveal that the beloved celebration is a scam.

episodes.name: Baby Talk
episodes.overview: When Flint creates an invention to make Earl believe his son, Cal, can talk, Earl goes overboard showing off his genius baby.

episodes.name: Now You See Him
episodes.overview: When Mayor Shelbourne incorrectly believes Flint's invention has made him invisible, he lives out his dream and goes on a tear through the town.

episodes.name: Major Science
episodes.overview: Desperate to make science interesting to his peers, Flint creates the superhero alter ego "Major Science."

episodes.name: Something Fishy
episodes.overview: While trying out an invention to help his dad learn to swim, Flint accidentally turns Tim into a fish.

episodes.name: Out to FLUNCH
episodes.overview: When Shelbourne confiscates Flint's beloved new invention, Sam organizes a heist to get it back.

episodes.name: The Kid's Got Moxy
episodes.overview: When Flint's new invention gives Gil some much-needed confidence, the mayor demands a moxy-boost of his own.

episodes.name: The New, New Girl
episodes.overview: Sam tries to help a new student settle into Swallow Falls.

episodes.name: Stormwave and Thunderhawk
episodes.overview: When Sam decides she wants a cool nickname, she and Flint struggle to jump through the hoops required to earn it.

episodes.name: Squirrels Just Wanna Have Fun
episodes.overview: Brent offers to rid Flint's lab of a squirrel infestation.

episodes.name: Sardine: The Movie
episodes.overview: Flint and Sam enter Brent's dreams to determine the source of Brent's sudden fear of sardines.

episodes.name: The Boy Who Cried Robot
episodes.overview: Flint suspects that Shelbourne may be a robot.

episodes.name: Fizzy Fish
episodes.overview: When the Fizzy Fish soda corporation takes over Cannery High, Flint and Sam take their protest right to the top.

episodes.name: FLUBER
episodes.overview: Flint revolutionizes transportation in Swallow Falls by harnessing the power of ratbirds.

episodes.name: Timmy Rockgood
episodes.overview: When Tim brushes off his guitar and revitalizes his classic rock act, Flint attempts to modernize his dad's outdated sound.

episodes.name: Swallow Fails
episodes.overview: Tired of being the butt of the world's jokes, Swallow Falls comes together to try to show how great their island really is.

episodes.name: Poppa Piglet
episodes.overview: When Mayor Shelbourne throws out Gil's favorite Poppa Piglet toys, Gil leaves home and moves in with Flint.

episodes.name: Mascot Wars
episodes.overview: Flint dons a worm suit to try and drum up business for his dad's bait shop.

episodes.name: Sardinasaurus
episodes.overview: Flint tries to make up for missing Sam's birthday, but she's too busy tracking a big news story to notice.

episodes.name: Flint vs. Flint
episodes.overview: Flint's creation of an AI alter ego backfires when his computerized self starts taking over the real Flint's life.

episodes.name: An Alluring Promise
episodes.overview: Flint invents a device to help his father end his fishing dry spell, but the special lure ends up attracting people instead of sardines.

episodes.name: Brent Bro
episodes.overview: When Flint and Brent suspect their parents are dating, Brent takes Flint under his wing.

episodes.name: Sardinee Babies
episodes.overview: When a local fast food joint starts including Sardinee Babies in their meals, Sam and Flint compete to collect all 37.

episodes.name: Party Tron
episodes.overview: Sam pretends to be Flint's new robot, but finds herself in peril.

episodes.name: The Happy Sardine
episodes.overview: When Flint's day at the beach goes sour, his dad encourages him to adopt a new 'Say Yes' attitude.

episodes.name: Less Ordinary People
episodes.overview: After destroying the town yet again, Flint does his best to be an ordinary kid.

episodes.name: Flint TV
episodes.overview: Flint's new invention transports the user into any TV show they choose.

episodes.name: Spa Daze
episodes.overview: Hector tricks Flint into helping him win a spot on the Shelbourne Walk of Fame, endangering the whole town in the process.

episodes.name: Mayor or Mayor Not
episodes.overview: Tired of Shelbourne's greedy taxes, Flint convinces his father to run for mayor.

episodes.name: Fisherman Sam
episodes.overview: Sam starts hanging out with a gang of gruff fishermen to get to the bottom of their uncanny ability to predict the weather.

episodes.name: Trees Company
episodes.overview: Brent and Flint get stuck up a tree together after one of Brent's jokes goes too far.

episodes.name: Tim, Jim and Kim
episodes.overview: Tensions arise when Tim's jealous brother Jim visits with his flirtatious new fiancée, Kim.

episodes.name: Live and Let Diary
episodes.overview: Flint, desperate to find out what Sam's giving him for his birthday, invents a device to read her diary out loud.

episodes.name: Rainbow Tim
episodes.overview: When Flint discovers his father only sees shades of grey, he sets out to blow Tim's mind with a device that lets him see color.

episodes.name: Mermaid You Look
episodes.overview: Tim discovers a mermaid in the ocean, but skeptical Flint doesn't believe they exist.

episodes.name: Mrs. Tinklebottom
episodes.overview: Mr. Earl thinks of himself as the healthiest person in Swallow Falls, but he's hiding a delicious, frosting-topped secret.

episodes.name: When There's a Gil There's a Way
episodes.overview: Gil takes over as principal and, much to his dad's surprise, actually improves the school.

episodes.name: Embarrass Brent
episodes.overview: Nothing embarrasses Brent, until he tries out Flint's new self-awareness-creating invention and becomes horrified by his boorish ways.

episodes.name: Flint Land
episodes.overview: Flint thinks his new series of interactive science exhibits is truly making a difference, but he's actually just created a bunch of carnival rides.

episodes.name: Your Dad is My Dad
episodes.overview: Flint gets jealous when Tim takes Brent (and a growing group of townsfolk) under his fatherly wing.

episodes.name: Totally Tall Tales
episodes.overview: Townspeople recount their versions of how the island of Swallow Falls came to be.

episodes.name: Flint's Fabulous Future
episodes.overview: Flint creates a machine that predicts a person's future occupation, and is surprised by his own result.

episodes.name: Have Yourself a Sardiney Little Christmas
episodes.overview: Sam discovers that Santa Claus is vacationing in Swallow Falls and drags Flint along to pitch their Christmas ideas to the jolly old elf.
